text: Pete Sampras was the defending champion, but did not participate. Jim Courier won the title, defeating Andre Agassi 6–3, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== ==External links== *Draw Category:1995 Japan Open Tennis Championships
title: 1995 Japan Open Tennis Championships – Men's Singles
